short_summary: the purchasem delivery and installation ofbfice furniture
full_summary:
=================================================================================================================
**Government Tender Announcement**
=================================================================================================================

> **Reference:** EP076-241635: Workspaces PSIB RFB Cat 1, 2, 3, 5, 6
>
> **Publication Date:** June 27, 2024
>
> **Closing Date:** July 23, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EDT (14:00:00)
>

[Backdrop]
-----------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) are announcing a Request for Bid (RFB) to procure the purchase, delivery, and installation of office furniture (categories 1, 2, 3, 5, 6) to the National Capital Region on behalf of Natural Resources Canada.

**Scope**
----------

The scope of this procurement includes:

* Office furniture:
	+ Chairs
	+ Bar stools
	+ Monitor arms or stands
	+ Panel systems
	+ Freestanding lighting or power or data components
	+ Freestanding tables
	+ Freestanding storage
	+ Lounge seating
	+ Stool seating
	+ Worksurfaces
	+ Upholstered benches
*

**Notice**
----------

The full RFB and attachments can be accessed and downloaded by logging into your SAP Ariba account.

**Important Notice**
------------------

* All required supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted on **July 23, 2024, 2:00 p.m. EDT (14:00:00)**.
* All bids submitted after the aforementioned time will be considered non-responsive.

**Procurement Information**
---------------------------

The procurement category is Government of Canada (GD), and the notice type is Respondent Led, Invitation to Submit Bid (IAS).

**Selection Criteria**
----------------------

Bids will be evaluated based on the lowest price.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

For any inquiries, please contact Michelle Wong (SPAC/PSPC) at michelle.wong@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Notice URL**
-----------------

The RFB can be accessed at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20149605

[Closing]
----------

Note: Ariba's URL may change, and users should verify with Ariba to obtain the most up-to-date URL.
